                 Bedevilled (2010) Film
|_________________________________________________________|
In a small village on a remote island, seven people spread among five families are murdered. 
Kim Bok-nam (Seo Young-Hee) is a resident in the village, a girl with innocent looks but with a dark side as well. 
Bok-Nam tries to runaway from the island where she finds the residents to be cruel, but cannot escape. 
Tragedy soon awaits for Bok-Nam ...
